resources.string:
"
"* Name, Age of player are required to begin math quiz"
" "
"* Math quiz contains 5 levels"
" "
"* Each level contains a single question of 10 points"
" "
"* Correct answer in 05 seconds will get 10 points"
" "
"* Correct answer in 10 seconds will get 05 points"
" "
"* After 10 seconds, player will move on next level automatically"
" "
"* After 5 levels Result page will appear"
"
